demo.title: Translation demo
demo.text: This is a simple demonstration app for ngx-translate
demo.paragraph: Try BabelEdit! This translation editor is made for ngx-translate!

icu.pluralization: There {count, plural, =0{is no apple} one{is one apple} other{there are several apples}}.
icu.select: {gender, select, male{He uses} female{She uses} other{They use }} {product}

things: There {count, plural, =0{is} one{is} other{are}} {count, plural, =0{} one{a} other{several}} {count, plural, =0{nothing} one{thing} other{things}}
people: {gender, select, male{He is} female{She is} other{They are}} {how}
